org.springframework.kafka.core

类 KafkaTemplate<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.kafka.core.KafkaTemplate<K,V>
  • 类型参数:
    K - the key type.
    V - the value type.
    所有已实现的接口:
    KafkaOperations<K,V>

    public class KafkaTemplate<K,V>
extends java.lang.Object
implements KafkaOperations<K,V>
    A template for executing high-level operations.

    • 嵌套类概要

      • 从接口继承的嵌套类/接口 org.springframework.kafka.core.KafkaOperations

        KafkaOperations.OperationsCallback<K,V,T>, KafkaOperations.ProducerCallback<K,V,T>

        protected final org.apache.commons.logging.Log logger

    • 构造器详细资料

      • KafkaTemplate

        public KafkaTemplate(ProducerFactory<K,V> producerFactory)
        Create an instance using the supplied producer factory and autoFlush false.
        参数:
        producerFactory - the producer factory.

      • KafkaTemplate

        public KafkaTemplate(ProducerFactory<K,V> producerFactory,
                     boolean autoFlush)
        Create an instance using the supplied producer factory and autoFlush setting. Set autoFlush to true if you wish to synchronously interact with Kafka, calling Future.get() on the result.
        参数:
        producerFactory - the producer factory.
        autoFlush - true to flush after each send.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getDefaultTopic

        public java.lang.String getDefaultTopic()
        The default topic for send methods where a topic is not provided.
        返回:
        the topic.

        public void setDefaultTopic(java.lang.String defaultTopic)

        参数:

      • setProducerListener

        public void setProducerListener(ProducerListener<K,V> producerListener)
        Set a ProducerListener which will be invoked when Kafka acknowledges a send operation. By default a LoggingProducerListener is configured which logs errors only.
        参数:
        producerListener - the listener; may be null.

      • getMessageConverter

        public MessageConverter getMessageConverter()
        Return the message converter.

      • send

        public org.springframework.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<SendResult<K,V>> send(org.springframework.messaging.Message<?> message)
        从接口复制的说明: KafkaOperations
        Send a message with routing information in message headers. The message payload may be converted before sending.
        指定者:
        send 在接口中 KafkaOperations<K,V>
        参数:
        message - the message to send.
        返回:
        a Future for the SendResult.
        另请参阅:
        KafkaHeaders.TOPIC, KafkaHeaders.PARTITION_ID, KafkaHeaders.MESSAGE_KEY

      • executeInTransaction

        public <T> T executeInTransaction(KafkaOperations.OperationsCallback<K,V,T> callback)
        从接口复制的说明: KafkaOperations
        Execute some arbitrary operation(s) on the operations and return the result. The operations are invoked within a local transaction and do not participate in a global transaction (if present).
        指定者:
        executeInTransaction 在接口中 KafkaOperations<K,V>
        类型参数:
        T - the result type.
        参数:
        callback - the callback.
        返回:
        the result.

      • flush

        public void flush()
        Flush the producer.

        Note It only makes sense to invoke this method if the ProducerFactory serves up a singleton producer (such as the DefaultKafkaProducerFactory).

        指定者:
        flush 在接口中 KafkaOperations<K,V>

      • sendOffsetsToTransaction

        public void sendOffsetsToTransaction(java.util.Map<org.apache.kafka.common.TopicPartition,org.apache.kafka.clients.consumer.OffsetAndMetadata> offsets)
        从接口复制的说明: KafkaOperations
        When running in a transaction (usually synchronized with some other transaction), send the consumer offset(s) to the transaction. The group id is obtained from ProducerFactoryUtils.getConsumerGroupId(). It is not necessary to call this method if the operations are invoked on a listener container thread since the container will take care of sending the offsets to the transaction.
        指定者:
        sendOffsetsToTransaction 在接口中 KafkaOperations<K,V>
        参数:
        offsets - The offsets.

      • sendOffsetsToTransaction

        public void sendOffsetsToTransaction(java.util.Map<org.apache.kafka.common.TopicPartition,org.apache.kafka.clients.consumer.OffsetAndMetadata> offsets,
                                     java.lang.String consumerGroupId)
        从接口复制的说明: KafkaOperations
        When running in a transaction (usually synchronized with some other transaction), send the consumer offset(s) to the transaction. It is not necessary to call this method if the operations are invoked on a listener container thread since the container will take care of sending the offsets to the transaction.
        指定者:
        sendOffsetsToTransaction 在接口中 KafkaOperations<K,V>
        参数:
        offsets - The offsets.
        consumerGroupId - the consumer's group.id.
